title: Worrywart
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Nozomi, help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Whoa, what’s wrong, Umi-chan?!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Apparently, Honoka is going to start skateboarding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Skateboarding? Huh, that sounds fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s not okay! It’s dangerous if she falls!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Well, isn’t falling part of the experience? She’s a beginner, after all. If she wears a helmet, protectors, and gloves, she should be fine, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-I guess if she has that much equipment on... But I’m still worried!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>...In that case, why don’t we join her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What?!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, it’s a great idea! Let’s go tell Honoka-chan that we want to join her too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh?! N-no, I didn’t say I wanted to... Nozomi?! Nozomiii~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
